Game.Name: Bleach Advance - Kurenai ni Somaru Soul Society (Japan)
Game.plot: Bleach Advance is an Adventure game, developed by Alpha Unit and published by Sega,which was released in Japan in 2005.Cheat: Character Unlock CodesEnter these codes on the title screen (not the intro) that is seen after finishing story mode. If you have already finished story mode with a character before just select them and continue the story which will take you to the title screen. You can do this as many times as you wish.
